title: Gender and College Major
question_text:
You want to study the relationship between gender and college major at the end of the sophomore year in college.
What would be the best way to display or analyze your collected data?

choices.text: Display the data in a segmented bar chart and compare.
Display the data in two bar charts and compare.
Create a scatterplot and compute the least squares regression line.

Calculate the correlation between gender and college major for each gender and compare the two
r
-values.
Create a side-by-side stemplot and compare center, shape, and spread.
